text:
Priya Prakash Varrier might be a popular name, thanks to her overnight success after her viral 'wink'. The song 'Manikya Malaraya Poovi' from her Malayalam movie Oru Aadar Love made her an internet sensation last year.
Her popularity must have sky-rocketed after viral wink but the actor is back in the news and not for all the right reasons.
The trailer of her debut Bollywood film directed by Prasanth Mambully directed was released today and it has landed itself in a big controversy.
Screengrab
Reports claim that Boney Kapoor has already issued a legal notice to the makers for the evident similarities between the trailer and his wife Sridevi's actual life.
From the name to the last scene in the trailer, where the lead actress is seen inside the bathtub, the similarities are too prominent to be ignored.

Confirming the same to an online portal, Mambully said, “We received a legal notice from Mr Boney Kapoor last week. And we will face it. My film is a suspense thriller. I told him (Boney Kapoor) that Sridevi is a common name. My film’s character also happens to be an actress. We will face it.”
That's not all. Even people on the internet are giving the film a big thumbs down for being 'sleazy' and 'disgusting'.
